 10	
 11	### Pourquoi les Assurances Classiques Échouent
 12	```
 13	❌ Coût prohibitif : 15,000-50,000 FCFA/an (= 2-3 mois de revenus)
 14	❌ Complexité administrative : formulaires, justificatifs, comptes bancaires
 15	❌ Délais indemnisation : 3-6 mois d'expertises terrain
 16	❌ Accessibilité : bureaux urbains vs agriculteurs ruraux
 17	```
 18	
 19	## Notre Solution
 20	
 21	### Assurance Révolutionnaire : Low-Tech, High-Impact
 22	Clim-Invest transforme l'assurance agricole en service mobile accessible :
 23	- **Souscription** : 3 minutes par SMS 
 24	- **Paiement** : Mobile Money (200-1000 FCFA/mois)
 25	- **Indemnisation** : Automatique par satellite en 24h
 26	- **Zéro paperasse** : Tout se passe sur le téléphone
 27	
 28	## Modèle Économique & Rentabilité
 29	
 30	### Comment On Génère Des Revenus
...
 45	
 46	#### 3. Revenus Annexes
 47	```
 48	 Sources complémentaires :
 49	├── Commissions Mobile Money : 1-2% sur chaque transaction
 50	├── Données agrégées : Vente insights météo/récoltes aux agrobusiness
 51	├── Services premium : Alertes préventives, conseils personnalisés
 52	└── Partenariats : Commissions sur vente intrants/semences
 53	```
 54	
 55	### Seuil de Rentabilité & Projections
 56	
 57	#### Phase 1 : Break-Even
 58	```
 59	 Objectif : 20,000 agriculteurs assurés
 60	├── Revenus mensuels : 10M FCFA (20k × 500 FCFA)
 61	├── Indemnisations : 8M FCFA (80%)
 62	├── Coûts techniques : 1.5M FCFA (15%)
 63	└── Profit : 500,000 FCFA/mois (5%)
 64	```
...
 208	
 209	export default function OnboardingScreen() {
 210	 const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
 211	 name: '',
 212	 phone: '',
 213	 location: null,
 214	 cropType: '',
 215	 area: 1
 216	 });
 217	
 218	 // Logique de calcul de prime basée sur zone de risque
 219	 const calculatePremium = () => {
 220	 const riskZones = {
 221	 'Alibori': 0.8, // Zone haute sécheresse
 222	 'Mono': 0.6, // Zone inondation modérée
 223	 'Atlantique': 0.4 // Zone faible risque
 224	 };
 225	 
 226	 const basePremium = formData.area * 500; // 500 FCFA par hectare
 227	 const riskMultiplier = riskZones[formData.location?.region] || 0.5;
 228	 return Math.round(basePremium * riskMultiplier);
 229	 };
 230	
 231	 return (
 232	 // Interface utilisateur avec navigation vers écran suivant
 233	 );
 234	}
 235	```
 236	
 237	### Écran 2 : Calcul Prime et Souscription
 238	**Fonction éducative :** Montrer la transparence du pricing vs boîte noire des assurances classiques
 239	
 240	**Contenu écran :**
 241	- Recap profil agriculteur avec carte de sa zone
 242	- Breakdown transparent du calcul : "Votre zone (Alibori) = risque élevé sécheresse"
 243	- Prime mensuelle calculée : "Votre protection : 800 FCFA/mois"
 244	- Couverture max : "Indemnisation jusqu'à 25,000 FCFA en cas de sinistre"
 245	- Options paiement : Mobile Money (MTN/Moov) avec logos
 246	- Bouton "Souscrire maintenant"
 247	
 248	**Logique métier critique :**
 249	```javascript
 250	// PricingLogic.js
 251	export const calculatePremiumWithRisk = (location, cropType, area, historicalData) => {
 252	 // Intégration données OpenEPI pour calcul risque réel
 253	 const weatherRisk = getWeatherRiskFromOpenEPI(location);
 254	 const cropVulnerability = getCropVulnerabilityIndex(cropType);
 255	 
 256	 const basePremium = area * 500;
 257	 const adjustedPremium = basePremium * weatherRisk * cropVulnerability;
 258	 
 259	 return {
 260	 monthly: Math.round(adjustedPremium),
 261	 coverage: Math.round(adjustedPremium * 30), // 30x la prime
 262	 explanation: generateRiskExplanation(weatherRisk, cropType)
 263	 };
 264	};

 41	
 42	## Déploiement Régional Structuré
 43	
 44	### Phase 1 : Pilote Multi-Pays (12 mois)
 45	
 46	- **Zones d'intervention** : Nord Bénin (sécheresse), Delta du Niger (inondations), Centre Sénégal (variabilité pluviométrique)
 47	- **Partenaires clés** : MTN Group, Orange, AGRHYMET, FENAFER-Bénin, FONGS-Sénégal
 48	- **Objectif** : 25 000 agriculteurs assurés
...
 60	
 61	| **Critère** | **Clim-Invest** | **Assurance Classique** |
 62	| :-- | :-- | :-- |
 63	| **Coût mensuel** | 200-1 000 FCFA | 5 000-20 000 FCFA[^18] |
 64	| **Délai d'indemnisation** | 24-72h automatique | 3-6 mois (expertise)[^3] |
 65	| **Accessibilité** | Mobile money + analphabètes | Bureau + compte bancaire |
 66	| **Couverture géographique** | Zones reculées via satellite | Centres urbains uniquement |
 67	| **Prérequis** | Téléphone basique | Smartphone + internet |
 68	
 69	## Fondations Technologiques Éprouvées
...
 80	
 81	**Seuil de rentabilité** : 50 000 assurés avec un fonds de réserve gouvernemental de 10% des primes pour les catastrophes majeures.
 82	
 83	## Enseignements Internationaux
 84	
 85	**Kenya (Kilimo Salama)** : Lancé en 2009 avec 200 agriculteurs, le programme a atteint 51 000 assurés au Kenya et 14 000 au Rwanda[^24][^25]. Les revenus de primes sont passés de 19 millions KSh en 2011 à 33 millions KSh en 6 mois en 2012[^26].
 86	
 87	**Inde (PMFBY)** : Le programme gouvernemental couvre 194 millions d'agriculteurs avec des subventions de 50% des primes[^18][^27]. Les primes varient de 1,5% à 5% des sommes assurées selon les cultures[^28].
 88	
 89	Ces succès démontrent la viabilité de l'assurance indicielle à grande échelle avec un soutien public approprié.

 2	
 3	# Solution Complète aux Erreurs d'API - Clim-Invest
 4	
 5	Basé sur la documentation officielle d'Open-Meteo et les meilleures pratiques, voici comment corriger **concrètement** vos erreurs d'API :
 6	
 7	## 1. Service Weather Correct (weatherService.ts)
 8	
 9	```typescript
 10	import axios from 'axios';
 11	
 12	// Configuration Axios robuste
 13	const weatherAPI = axios.create({
 14	 timeout: 15000, // 15 secondes timeout
 15	 headers: {
 16	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 17	 'User-Agent': 'ClimInvest-App/1.0'
 18	 }
 19	});
...
 304	
 305	Dans `AppNavigator.tsx`, corrigez la navigation vers Claims :
 306	
 307	```typescript
 308	// ❌ INCORRECT
 309	navigation.navigate('Dashboard', { screen: 'Claims', params: { emergency: true }});
 310	
 311	// ✅ CORRECT
 312	navigation.navigate('Claims', { emergency: true });
 313	```
 314	
 315	
 316	## 5. Variables d'Environnement
 317	
 318	Créez un fichier `.env` à la racine :
 319	
 320	```bash
 321	# APIs Météo
 322	OPEN_METEO_BASE_URL=https://api.open-meteo.com
 323	OPEN_METEO_ARCHIVE_URL=https://archive-api.open-meteo.com
 324	
 325	# OpenEPI (si vous l'utilisez plus tard)
 326	OPENEPI_BASE_URL=https://developer.openepi.io
 327	OPENEPI_API_KEY=your_key_here
 328	
 329	# Configuration
 330	API_TIMEOUT=15000
 331	```
 332	
 333	
 334	## 6. Tests des APIs
 335	
 336	Créez un fichier de test `testWeatherAPI.js` :
 337	
 338	```javascript
 339	const axios = require('axios');
...

 1	import React from 'react';
 2	import { createBottomTabNavigator } from '@react-navigation/bottom-tabs';
 3	import { createNativeStackNavigator } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';

 12	import HistoryScreen from '../screens/HistoryScreen';

 14	import SettingsScreen from '../screens/SettingsScreen';
 15	import ClaimsScreen from '../screens/ClaimsScreen';
 16	import WeatherTestScreen from '../screens/WeatherTestScreen';
 17	
 18	const Tab = createBottomTabNavigator();
 19	const Stack = createNativeStackNavigator();
 20	
 21	// Stack pour le Dashboard (inclut les écrans secondaires)
 22	function DashboardStack() {
 23	 return (
 24	 <Stack.Navigator
 25	 screenOptions={{
 26	 headerShown: false,
 27	 gestureEnabled: true,
 28	 animation: 'slide_from_right'
 29	 }}
 30	 >
 31	 <Stack.Screen name="DashboardMain" component={DashboardScreen} />
 32	 <Stack.Screen name="Claims" component={ClaimsScreen} />
 33	 <Stack.Screen name="WeatherTest" component={WeatherTestScreen} />
 34	 </Stack.Navigator>
 35	 );
 36	}
 37	
 38	// Stack pour les Paramètres
 39	function SettingsStack() {
 40	 return (
 41	 <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>
 42	 <Stack.Screen name="SettingsMain" component={SettingsScreen} />
 43	 <Stack.Screen name="WeatherTest" component={WeatherTestScreen} />
 44	 </Stack.Navigator>
 45	 );
 46	}
 47	
 48	// Composant d'icône personnalisé avec badges
 49	function TabIcon({ name, focused }: { name: string; focused: boolean }) {
 50	 const icons = {
 51	 Dashboard: focused ? '' : '',
 52	 History: focused ? '' : '',
 53	 Payments: focused ? '' : '',
 54	 Settings: focused ? '⚙️' : ''
 55	 };
 56	
 57	 // Simulation de notifications (à remplacer par de vraies données)
 58	 const notificationCounts = {
 59	 Dashboard: 2, // Alertes météo
 60	 History: 0,
 61	 Payments: 1, // Paiement en attente
 62	 Settings: 0
 63	 };
 64	
 65	 return (
 66	 <View style={{
 67	 alignItems: 'center',
 68	 justifyContent: 'center',
 69	 transform: focused ? [{ scale: 1.1 }] : [{ scale: 1 }],
 70	 position: 'relative'
 71	 }}>
 72	 <Text style={{
 73	 fontSize: 22,
 74	 opacity: focused ? 1 : 0.7
 75	 }}>
 76	 {icons[name as keyof typeof icons]}
 77	 </Text>
 78	
 79	 {/* Badge de notification */}
 80	 <TabBadge count={notificationCounts[name as keyof typeof notificationCounts]} />
 81	 </View>
 82	 );
 83	}
 84

 86	
 87	 return (

 89	 screenOptions={({ route }) => ({

 218	* la **librairie JavaScript OpenEPI**, l’API **WIS2 Burkina**, l’API **Open‑Meteo** et compléments satellitaires de **NASA / AGRHYMET**,
 219	* vous obtenez :
 220	
 221	 * des données météo locales et certifiées (pluie, vent, pression, radiation),
 222	 * des **indices NDVI et ET₀** utiles à la détection de stress hydrique,
 223	 * un mécanisme de **validation croisée** permettant de détecter les écarts de données,
 224	 * des **triggers automatiques** pour alerter l’utilisateur ou déclencher une indemnisation,
 225	 * une **tarification dynamique** selon le risque climatique local.

 228	 try {
 229	 setLoading(true);
 230	 setError(null);

 232	 // Récupération en parallèle (plus rapide)
 233	 const [currentWeather, riskData] = await Promise.all([
 234	 WeatherService.getCurrentWeather(latitude, longitude),
 235	 WeatherService.analyzeClimateRisk(latitude, longitude, cropType)
 236	 ]);
 237	
 238	 setWeatherData(currentWeather);
 239	 setRiskAnalysis(riskData);
 240	 } catch (err) {
 241	 const errorMessage = err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Erreur météo inconnue';
 242	 setError(errorMessage);
 243	 console.error('Hook météo - Erreur:', errorMessage);
 244	 } finally {
 245	 setLoading(false);
 246	 }

 68	 client_id: ENV_CONFIG.OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID,

 86	 bbox: params.bbox.join(','),
 87	 start_date: params.start,
 88	 end_date: params.end,
 89	 format: 'json'
 90	 }
 91	 });
 92	
 93	 return response.data;

 53	 async getCurrentWeather(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<OpenMeteoCurrentWeather> {
 54	 try {
 55	 // Validation des coordonnées
 56	 if (!DateUtils.validateCoordinates(lat, lon)) {
 57	 throw new Error('Coordonnées GPS invalides');
 58	 }
 59	
 60	 const { lat: roundedLat, lon: roundedLon } = DateUtils.roundCoordinates(lat, lon);
 61	
 62	 const response = await this.client.get('/forecast', {
 63	 params: {
 64	 latitude: roundedLat,
 65	 longitude: roundedLon,
 66	 current: [
 67	 'temperature_2m',
 68	 'relative_humidity_2m',
 69	 'precipitation',
 70	 'wind_speed_10m',
 71	 'wind_direction_10m'
 72	 ].join(','),
 73	 timezone: 'Africa/Ouagadougou'
 74	 }
 75	 });
 76	
 77	 return response.data;
 78	 } catch (error) {
 79	 console.error('❌ Erreur météo actuelle Open-Meteo:', error);
 80	 throw new Error('Impossible de récupérer la météo actuelle');
 81	 }
 82	 }

 92	 days = 7; // Valeur par défaut sécurisée
 93	 }
 94	
 95	 const { lat: roundedLat, lon: roundedLon } = DateUtils.roundCoordinates(lat, lon);
 96	
 97	 const response = await this.client.get('/forecast', {
 98	 params: {
 99	 latitude: roundedLat,
 100	 longitude: roundedLon,
 101	 daily: [
 102	 'temperature_2m_max',
 103	 'temperature_2m_min',
 104	 'precipitation_sum',
 105	 'wind_speed_10m_max',
 106	 'precipitation_probability_max'
 107	 ].join(','),
 108	 forecast_days: days,
 109	 timezone: 'Africa/Ouagadougou'
 110	 }
 111	 });

**Mises à jour de l'écran de paiement :**
1. Mettez à jour le calendrier/échéancier de paiement sur les écrans de paiement afin qu'il corresponde aux données affichées sur l'écran d'accueil.
2. Mettez à jour les prix des primes affichés au bas des écrans de paiement (dans des sections telles que « paiements récents ») afin qu'ils correspondent aux données de l'écran d'accueil.
3. Supprimez le bouton « retour » en haut des écrans de paiement.
4. Supprimer le bouton « Retour » de l'écran des paramètres/réglages.

**Mise en œuvre d'OpenEPI :**
Une fois les mises à jour de l'écran de paiement terminées, mettre en œuvre la fonctionnalité OpenEPI comme indiqué dans `@/README_OPENEPI_IMPLEMENTATION.md`. Se concentrer d'abord sur la mise en œuvre des fonctionnalités spécifiques suivantes :
- ❌ Intégration des données pédologiques (SoilGrids, AfSoilGrids)
- ❌ Rendements agricoles historiques (FAO Global Crop Yields)
- ❌ Prix des cultures en temps réel (AMIS)
- ❌ Système de notation de la fiabilité des agriculteurs

**Approche de mise en œuvre :**
1. Créez un nouvel onglet/une nouvelle section dans l'application pour ces fonctionnalités OpenEPI
2. Consultez la documentation officielle OpenEPI (`GUIDE_OPENEPI.md`) pour comprendre comment utiliser et intégrer correctement ces sources de données
3. Suivez les directives de mise en œuvre dans le fichier README pour une intégration API correcte

"},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Here's the result of running `cat -n` on README_OPENEPI_IMPLEMENTATION.md:
 1	# Guide d'Implémentation OpenEPI pour ClimInvest
 2	
 3	## Analyse : Ce qui manque dans l'application actuelle
 4	
 5	### ✅ **Déjà implémenté** :
 6	- Service OpenEPI de base (`src/services/openEpiService.ts`)
 7	- Données météo actuelles et historiques (Open-Meteo + OpenEPI)
 8	- Validation croisée des données météo
 9	- Historique des catastrophes (EM-DAT, AFDM)
 10	- Calcul des risques climatiques basiques
 11	
 12	### ❌ **Manquant - Fonctionnalités critiques OpenEPI** :
 13	
 14	#### 1. **Effet de Levier (Accès au Crédit)**
 15	- ❌ Données pédologiques (SoilGrids, AfSoilGrids)
 16	- ❌ Rendements agricoles historiques (FAO Global Crop Yields)
 17	- ❌ Prix des cultures en temps réel (AMIS)
 18	- ❌ Scoring de fiabilité agriculteur
 19	- ❌ Interface banques/institutions financières
 20	
 21	#### 2. **Résilience (Alertes Climatiques Avancées)**
 22	- ❌ Prévisions météo à 10 jours (ECMWF, NOAA GFS)
 23	- ❌ Indices de stress hydrique (ESI, CHIRPS)
 24	- ❌ Risques d'érosion/inondation (GlobErosion, NASA Flood Mapping)
 25	- ❌ Alertes SMS/USSD proactives
 26	- ❌ Système de recommandations agricoles
 27	
 28	#### 3. **Données Satellitaires**
 29	- ❌ Indices NDVI en temps réel
 30	- ❌ Évapotranspiration (ET₀)
 31	- ❌ Anomalies de végétation
 32	- ❌ Cartographie des zones à risque
 33	
 34	---
 35	
 36	## Plan d'Implémentation Étape par Étape
 37	
 38	### **Phase 1 : Fondations OpenEPI (Semaine 1-2)**
 39	
 40	#### Étape 1.1 : Configuration OpenEPI complète
 41	```bash
 42	# 1. Obtenir les clés API OpenEPI
 43	# Inscription sur https://developer.openepi.io/
 44	# Récupérer : CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET, API_KEY
 45	
 46	# 2. Mettre à jour .env
 47	echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_BASE_URL=https://api.openepi.io/v1" >> .env
 48	echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id" >> .env
 49	echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret" >> .env
 50	echo "EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_API_KEY=your_api_key" >> .env
 51	```
 52	
 53	#### Étape 1.2 : Service OpenEPI étendu
 54	Créer `src/services/openEpiAdvancedService.ts` :
 55	
 56	```typescript
 57	export class OpenEpiAdvancedService {
 58	 // Données pédologiques
 59	 async getSoilData(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<SoilData> {
 60	 return this.client.get('/soil/soilgrids', {
 61	 params: { latitude: lat, longitude: lon, depth: '0-30cm' }
 62	 });
 63	 }
 64	
 65	 // Rendements historiques
 66	 async getCropYields(country: string, crop: string, years: number = 5): Promise<YieldData> {
 67	 return this.client.get('/agriculture/yields', {
 68	 params: { country, crop, years }
 69	 });
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 // Prix des cultures
 73	 async getCropPrices(crop: string, market: string): Promise<PriceData> {
 74	 return this.client.get('/markets/prices', {
 75	 params: { commodity: crop, market }
 76	 });
 77	 }
 78	
 79	 // Prévisions étendues (10 jours)
 80	 async getExtendedForecast(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<ExtendedForecast> {
 81	 return this.client.get('/weather/forecast/extended', {
 82	 params: { latitude: lat, longitude: lon, days: 10 }
 83	 });
 84	 }
 85	
 86	 // Indices de stress hydrique
 87	 async getWaterStressIndex(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<WaterStressData> {
 88	 return this.client.get('/climate/water-stress', {
 89	 params: { latitude: lat, longitude: lon }
 90	 });
 91	 }
 92	
 93	 // Données NDVI satellitaires
 94	 async getNDVIData(lat: number, lon: number, startDate: string, endDate: string): Promise<NDVIData> {
 95	 return this.client.get('/satellite/ndvi', {
 96	 params: { latitude: lat, longitude: lon, start_date: startDate, end_date: endDate }
 97	 });
 98	 }
 99	}
 100	```
 101	
 102	### **Phase 2 : Effet de Levier - Scoring Crédit (Semaine 3-4)**
 103	
 104	#### Étape 2.1 : Service de Scoring Agriculteur
 105	Créer `src/services/creditScoringService.ts` :
 106	
 107	```typescript
 108	export interface FarmerCreditScore {
 109	 overallScore: number; // 0-1000
 110	 soilQuality: number;
 111	 historicalYields: number;
 112	 insuranceHistory: number;
 113	 marketAccess: number;
 114	 riskLevel: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high';
 115	 creditRecommendation: string;
 116	}
 117	
 118	export class CreditScoringService {
 119	 async calculateCreditScore(
 120	 farmerId: string,
 121	 location: { lat: number; lon: number },
 122	 cropType: string
 123	 ): Promise<FarmerCreditScore> {
 124	 
 125	 // 1. Récupérer données sol
 126	 const soilData = await openEpiAdvanced.getSoilData(location.lat, location.lon);
 127	 const soilScore = this.calculateSoilScore(soilData);
 128	
 129	 // 2. Historique des rendements
 130	 const yieldData = await openEpiAdvanced.getCropYields('Benin', cropType);
 131	 const yieldScore = this.calculateYieldScore(yieldData, location);
 132	
 133	 // 3. Historique d'assurance
 134	 const insuranceHistory = await this.getInsuranceHistory(farmerId);
 135	 const insuranceScore = this.calculateInsuranceScore(insuranceHistory);
 136	
 137	 // 4. Accès au marché
 138	 const marketData = await openEpiAdvanced.getCropPrices(cropType, 'Cotonou');
 139	 const marketScore = this.calculateMarketScore(marketData, location);
 140	
 141	 // 5. Score global
 142	 const overallScore = Math.round(
 143	 (soilScore * 0.3) + 
 144	 (yieldScore * 0.25) + 
 145	 (insuranceScore * 0.25) + 
 146	 (marketScore * 0.2)
 147	 );
 148	
 149	 return {
 150	 overallScore,
 151	 soilQuality: soilScore,
 152	 historicalYields: yieldScore,
 153	 insuranceHistory: insuranceScore,
 154	 marketAccess: marketScore,
 155	 riskLevel: this.determineRiskLevel(overallScore),
 156	 creditRecommendation: this.generateRecommendation(overallScore, soilData, insuranceHistory)
 157	 };
 158	 }
 159	}
 160	```
 161

 244	
 245	### **Phase 3 : Alertes Climatiques Avancées (Semaine 5-6)**
 246	
 247	#### Étape 3.1 : Service d'Alertes Proactives
 248	Créer `src/services/proactiveAlertsService.ts` :
 249	
 250	```typescript
 251	export interface ClimateAlert {
 252	 id: string;
 253	 type: 'drought' | 'flood' | 'storm' | 'heat_wave' | 'frost';
 254	 severity: 'info' | 'warning' | 'critical';
 255	 title: string;
 256	 message: string;
 257	 actionRequired: string;
 258	 validUntil: string;
 259	 affectedCrops: string[];
 260	}
 261	
 262	export class ProactiveAlertsService {
 263	 async generateAlerts(
 264	 location: { lat: number; lon: number },
 265	 cropType: string
 266	 ): Promise<ClimateAlert[]> {
 267	 
 268	 const alerts: ClimateAlert[] = [];
 269	
 270	 // 1. Prévisions étendues (10 jours)
 271	 const forecast = await openEpiAdvanced.getExtendedForecast(location.lat, location.lon);
 272	 
 273	 // 2. Indices de stress hydrique
 274	 const waterStress = await openEpiAdvanced.getWaterStressIndex(location.lat, location.lon);
 275	 
 276	 // 3. Données NDVI récentes
 277	 const ndviData = await openEpiAdvanced.getNDVIData(
 278	 location.lat, 
 279	 location.lon, 
 280	 this.getDateDaysAgo(30), 
 281	 this.getToday()
 282	 );
 283	
 284	 // Analyser les risques
 285	 if (this.detectDroughtRisk(forecast, waterStress, ndviData)) {
 286	 alerts.push({
 287	 id: `drought_${Date.now()}`,
 288	 type: 'drought',
 289	 severity: 'warning',
 290	 title: 'Risque de Sécheresse',
 291	 message: 'Conditions sèches prévues dans les 5 prochains jours',
 292	 actionRequired: 'Préparez l\'irrigation si possible. Paillez vos cultures.',
 293	 validUntil: this.getDateDaysFromNow(5),
 294	 affectedCrops: [cropType]
 295	 });
 296	 }
 297	
 298	 if (this.detectFloodRisk(forecast)) {
 299	 alerts.push({
 300	 id: `flood_${Date.now()}`,
 301	 type: 'flood',
 302	 severity: 'critical',
 303	 title: 'Risque d\'Inondation',
 304	 message: 'Fortes pluies prévues (>100mm) dans les 48h',
 305	 actionRequired: 'Créez des canaux de drainage. Protégez vos récoltes.',
 306	 validUntil: this.getDateDaysFromNow(2),
 307	 affectedCrops: [cropType]
 308	 });
 309	 }
 310	
 311	 return alerts;
 312	 }
 313	
 314	 // Envoyer alertes par SMS
 315	 async sendSMSAlerts(phoneNumber: string, alerts: ClimateAlert[]): Promise<void> {
 316	 for (const alert of alerts) {
 317	 const message = ` ${alert.title}: ${alert.message}. Action: ${alert.actionRequired}`;
 318	 await smsService.sendSMS(phoneNumber, message);
 319	 }
 320	 }
 321	}
 322	```

 324	#### Étape 3.2 : Composant d'Alertes Temps Réel
 325	Créer `src/components/alerts/ProactiveAlertsSection.tsx` :
 326	
 327	```typescript
 328	export default function ProactiveAlertsSection() {
 329	 const [alerts, setAlerts] = useState<ClimateAlert[]>([]);
 330	 const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
 331	 const { user } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.auth);
 332	
 333	 useEffect(() => {
 334	 loadAlerts();
 335	 // Actualiser toutes les heures
 336	 const interval = setInterval(loadAlerts, 60 * 60 * 1000);
 337	 return () => clearInterval(interval);
 338	 }, []);
 339	
 340	 const loadAlerts = async () => {
 341	 try {
 342	 const newAlerts = await proactiveAlertsService.generateAlerts(
 343	 user.location,
 344	 user.cropType
 345	 );
 346	 setAlerts(newAlerts);
 347	 } catch (error) {
 348	 console.error('Erreur chargement alertes:', error);
 349	 } finally {
 350	 setLoading(false);
 351	 }
 352	 };
 353	
 354	 const getSeverityColor = (severity: string) => {
 355	 switch (severity) {
 356	 case 'critical': return COLORS.error;
 357	 case 'warning': return COLORS.warning;
 358	 default: return COLORS.accent;
 359	 }
 360	 };
 361	
 362	 const getSeverityIcon = (type: string) => {
 363	 const icons = {
 364	 drought: '',
 365	 flood: '',
 366	 storm: '⛈️',
 367	 heat_wave: '',
 368	 frost: '❄️'
 369	 };
 370	 return icons[type as keyof typeof icons] || '⚠️';
 371	 };
 372	
 373	 if (loading) {
 374	 return (
 375	 <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>
 376	 <ActivityIndicator size="small" color={COLORS.primary} />
 377	 <Text>Analyse des risques climatiques...</Text>
 378	 </View>
 379	 );
 380	 }
 381	
 382	 return (
 383	 <View style={styles.container}>
 384	 <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}> Alertes Climatiques</Text>
 385	 
 386	 {alerts.length === 0 ? (
 387	 <View style={styles.noAlertsCard}>
 388	 <Text style={styles.noAlertsText}>✅ Aucune alerte active</Text>
 389	 <Text style={styles.noAlertsSubtext}>Conditions favorables pour vos cultures</Text>
 390	 </View>
 391	 ) : (
 392	 alerts.map((alert) => (
 393	 <View 
 394	 key={alert.id} 
 395	 style={[
 396	 styles.alertCard,
 397	 { borderLeftColor: getSeverityColor(alert.severity) }
 398	 ]}
 399	 >
 400	 <View style={styles.alertHeader}>
 401	 <Text style={styles.alertIcon}>
 402	 {getSeverityIcon(alert.type)}
 403	 </Text>
 404	 <Text style={styles.alertTitle}>{alert.title}</Text>
 405	 <View style={[
 406	 styles.severityBadge,
 407	 { backgroundColor: getSeverityColor(alert.severity) + '20' }
 408	 ]}>
 409	 <Text style={[
 410	 styles.severityText,
 411	 { color: getSeverityColor(alert.severity) }
 412	 ]}>
 413	 {alert.severity.toUpperCase()}
 414	 </Text>
 415	 </View>
 416	 </View>
 417	 
 418	 <Text style={styles.alertMessage}>{alert.message}</Text>
 419	 
 420	 <View style={styles.actionCard}>
 421	 <Text style={styles.actionTitle}> Action recommandée :</Text>
 422	 <Text style={styles.actionText}>{alert.actionRequired}</Text>
 423	 </View>
 424	 
 425	 <Text style={styles.validUntil}>
 426	 Valide jusqu'au {new Date(alert.validUntil).toLocaleDateString('fr-FR')}
 427	 </Text>
 428	 </View>
 429	 ))
 430	 )}
 431	 
 432	 <Text style={styles.lastUpdate}>
 433	 Dernière mise à jour : {new Date().toLocaleTimeString('fr-FR')}
 434	 </Text>
 435	 </View>
 436	 );
 437	}
 438	```

 440	### **Phase 4 : Données Satellitaires NDVI (Semaine 7-8)**
 441	
 442	#### Étape 4.1 : Service NDVI et Végétation
 443	Créer `src/services/vegetationMonitoringService.ts` :
 444	
 445	```typescript
 446	export interface VegetationHealth {
 447	 ndvi: number; // 0-1
 448	 status: 'excellent' | 'good' | 'moderate' | 'poor' | 'critical';
 449	 trend: 'improving' | 'stable' | 'declining';
 450	 anomaly: number; // -1 à +1 (par rapport à la normale)
 451	 recommendations: string[];
 452	}
 453	
 454	export class VegetationMonitoringService {
 455	 async analyzeVegetationHealth(
 456	 location: { lat: number; lon: number },
 457	 cropType: string
 458	 ): Promise<VegetationHealth> {
 459	 
 460	 // Récupérer NDVI des 30 derniers jours
 461	 const ndviData = await openEpiAdvanced.getNDVIData(
 462	 location.lat,
 463	 location.lon,
 464	 this.getDateDaysAgo(30),
 465	 this.getToday()
 466	 );
 467	
 468	 // Calculer NDVI moyen récent
 469	 const recentNDVI = this.calculateAverageNDVI(ndviData.values.slice(-7)); // 7 derniers jours
 470	 
 471	 // Comparer avec la normale saisonnière
 472	 const historicalNDVI = await this.getHistoricalNDVI(location, this.getCurrentMonth());
 473	 const anomaly = (recentNDVI - historicalNDVI.average) / historicalNDVI.stdDev;
 474	 
 475	 // Déterminer le statut
 476	 const status = this.determineVegetationStatus(recentNDVI, anomaly);
 477	 
 478	 // Analyser la tendance
 479	 const trend = this.analyzeTrend(ndviData.values.slice(-14)); // 14 derniers jours
 480	 
 481	 // Générer recommandations
 482	 const recommendations = this.generateVegetationRecommendations(
 483	 status, 
 484	 trend, 
 485	 anomaly, 
 486	 cropType
 487	 );
 488	
 489	 return {
 490	 ndvi: recentNDVI,
 491	 status,
 492	 trend,
 493	 anomaly,
 494	 recommendations
 495	 };
 496	 }
 497	
 498	 private determineVegetationStatus(ndvi: number, anomaly: number): VegetationHealth['status'] {
 499	 if (ndvi > 0.7 && anomaly > 0.5) return 'excellent';
 500	 if (ndvi > 0.5 && anomaly > 0) return 'good';
 501	 if (ndvi > 0.3 && anomaly > -0.5) return 'moderate';
 502	 if (ndvi > 0.2 && anomaly > -1) return 'poor';
 503	 return 'critical';
 504	 }
 505	
 506	 private generateVegetationRecommendations(
 507	 status: VegetationHealth['status'],
 508	 trend: VegetationHealth['trend'],
 509	 anomaly: number,
 510	 cropType: string
 511	 ): string[] {
 512	 const recommendations: string[] = [];
 513	
 514	 if (status === 'critical' || (status === 'poor' && trend === 'declining')) {
 515	 recommendations.push(' Situation critique : Vérifiez l\'irrigation immédiatement');
 516	 recommendations.push(' Considérez un apport d\'engrais foliaire');
 517	 recommendations.push('️ Préparez une déclaration de sinistre si nécessaire');
 518	 }
 519	
 520	 if (anomaly < -0.5) {
 521	 recommendations.push(' Végétation en dessous de la normale saisonnière');
 522	 recommendations.push(' Augmentez la fréquence d\'arrosage si possible');
 523	 }
 524	
 525	 if (trend === 'improving' && status === 'good') {
 526	 recommendations.push('✅ Excellente évolution, continuez les pratiques actuelles');
 527	 recommendations.push(' Période favorable pour les traitements préventifs');
 528	 }
 529	
 530	 return recommendations;
 531	 }
 532	}
 533	```

 575	## Configuration et Déploiement
 576	
 577	### Variables d'Environnement Complètes
 578	```bash
 579	# OpenEPI Configuration
 580	EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_BASE_URL=https://api.openepi.io/v1
 581	EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID=your_client_id
 582	EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET=your_client_secret
 583	EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_API_KEY=your_api_key
 584	
 585	# Services Externes
 586	EXPO_PUBLIC_SOILGRIDS_API_URL=https://rest.isric.org/soilgrids/v2.0
 587	EXPO_PUBLIC_FAO_YIELDS_API_URL=https://www.fao.org/faostat/api/v1
 588	EXPO_PUBLIC_AMIS_PRICES_API_URL=https://amis-outlook.org/api/v1
 589	
 590	# SMS/Notifications
 591	EXPO_PUBLIC_SMS_GATEWAY_URL=your_sms_gateway
 592	EXPO_PUBLIC_SMS_API_KEY=your_sms_key
 593	```
 594	
 595	### Installation des Dépendances
 596	```bash
 597	# Géolocalisation avancée
 598	npm install expo-location expo-background-fetch
 599	
 600	# Notifications push
 601	npm install expo-notifications
 602	
 603	# Graphiques pour les données
 604	npm install react-native-chart-kit react-native-svg
 605	
 606	# Cache pour les données satellitaires
 607	npm install @react-native-async-storage/async-storage
 608	```

 615	1. **Alertes Proactives** : Réduction de 50% des sinistres grâce aux alertes préventives
 616	2. **Accès au Crédit** : 30% des utilisateurs avec score >700 obtiennent un crédit

 618	4. **Adoption** : 70% des utilisateurs activent les alertes SMS

 620	### Tests de Performance
 621	- Temps de réponse API OpenEPI : <3 secondes

 1	import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
 2	import { View, Text, ScrollView, RefreshControl, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
 3	import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux';
 4	import { fetchCoverageStatus } from '../store/slices/insuranceSlice';
 5	import { useWeatherData } from '../hooks/useWeatherData';
 6	import AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';
 7	import PaymentCountdown from '../components/common/PaymentCountdown';
 8	import DisasterHistorySection from '../components/dashboard/DisasterHistorySection';
 9	import { COLORS, ACCESSIBILITY_SETTINGS } from '../utils/constants';
 10	import { RootState, AppDispatch } from '../store/store';
 11	
 12	interface DashboardScreenProps {
 13	 navigation: any;
 14	}
 15	
 16	export default function DashboardScreen({ navigation }: DashboardScreenProps) {
 17	 const dispatch = useDispatch<AppDispatch>();
 18	 const { user } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.auth);
 19	 const { coverage, loading } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.insurance);
 20	 const [refreshing, setRefreshing] = useState(false);
 21	
 22	 // Utilisation du nouveau hook météo robuste
 23	 const { weatherData, riskAnalysis, loading: weatherLoading, error: weatherError, refetch } = useWeatherData(
 24	 user?.location.latitude,
 25	 user?.location.longitude
 26	 );
 27	
 28	 useEffect(() => {
 29	 if (user) {
 30	 loadDashboardData();
 31	 }
 32	 }, [user]);
 33	
 34	 const loadDashboardData = async () => {
 35	 if (!user) return;
 36	
 37	 await Promise.all([
 38	 dispatch(fetchCoverageStatus(user.id)),
 39	 refetch(user?.cropType || 'maize') // Recharger les données météo
 40	 ]);
 41	 };
 42	
 43	 const onRefresh = async () => {
 44	 setRefreshing(true);
 45	 await loadDashboardData();
 46	 setRefreshing(false);
 47	 };
 48	
 49	 const handleEmergencyClaim = () => {
 50	 navigation.navigate('Claims', { emergency: true });
 51	 };
 52	
 53	 const handleSubscribeInsurance = () => {
 54	 navigation.navigate('SubscribeInsurance');
 55	 };
 56	
 57	 const handleReferColleague = () => {
 58	 navigation.navigate('ReferColleague');
 59	 };
 60	
 61	 if (!user) {
 62	 return (
 63	 <View style={styles.container}>
 64	 <Text>Chargement...</Text>
 65	 </View>
 66	 );
 67	 }
 68	
 69	 return (
 70	 <ScrollView
 71	 style={styles.container}
 72	 refreshControl={
 73	 <RefreshControl
 74	 refreshing={refreshing}
 75	 onRefresh={onRefresh}
 76	 accessibilityLabel="Actualiser les données"
 77	 />
 78	 }
 79	 accessible={true}
 80	 accessibilityLabel="Tableau de bord agriculteur"
 81	 >
 82	 {/* En-tête utilisateur */}
 83	 <View style={styles.header}>
 84	 <Text
 85	 style={styles.welcomeText}
 86	 accessible={true}
 87	 >
 88	 Bonjour {user.name} 
 89	 </Text>
 90	 <Text 
 91	 style={styles.statusText}
 92	 accessibilityLabel={`Statut couverture : ${coverage?.isActive ? 'Actif' : 'Inactif'}`}
 93	 >
 94	 {coverage?.isActive ? '️ Protégé' : '⚠️ Non protégé'}
 95	 </Text>
 96	 </View>
 97	
 98	 {/* Carte de couverture */}
 99	 {coverage && (
 100	 <View style={styles.coverageCard}>
 101	 <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>Ma Couverture</Text>
 102	 <View style={styles.coverageDetails}>
 103	 <View style={styles.coverageItem}>
 104	 <Text style={styles.coverageLabel}>Culture assurée</Text>
 105	 <Text style={styles.coverageValue}>
 106	 {coverage.cropType === 'maize' ? ' Maïs' :
 107	 coverage.cropType === 'cotton' ? ' Coton' :
 108	 coverage.cropType === 'groundnut' ? ' Arachide' :
 109	 coverage.cropType === 'cowpea' ? ' Niébé' :
 110	 coverage.cropType === 'rice' ? ' Riz' :
 111	 coverage.cropType === 'millet' ? ' Mil' :
 112	 coverage.cropType === 'sorghum' ? ' Sorgho' :
 113	 ` ${coverage.cropType}`}
 114	 </Text>
 115	 </View>
 116	 <View style={styles.coverageItem}>
 117	 <Text style={styles.coverageLabel}>Montant assuré</Text>
 118	 <Text style={styles.coverageValue}>{coverage.amount.toLocaleString()} FCFA</Text>
 119	 </View>
 120	 <View style={styles.coverageItem}>
 121	 <Text style={styles.coverageLabel}>Prime mensuelle</Text>
 122	 <Text style={styles.coverageValue}>{coverage.premium.toLocaleString()} FCFA</Text>
 123	 </View>
 124	 <View style={styles.coverageItem}>
 125	 <Text style={styles.coverageLabel}>Expire le</Text>
 126	 <Text style={styles.coverageValue}>
 127	 {new Date(coverage.expiryDate).toLocaleDateString('fr-FR')}
 128	 </Text>
 129	 </View>
 130	 </View>
 131	 </View>
 132	 )}
 133

 135	 <PaymentCountdown
 136	 paymentDate="2025-07-19" // Date du dernier paiement (19 juillet 2025)
 137	 cycleDays={30} // Cycle de 30 jours
 138	 />
 139	
 140	 {/* Données météo actuelles */}
 141	 {weatherData && (
 142	 <View style={styles.weatherSection}>
 143	 <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>️ Météo</Text>
 144	 <View style={styles.weatherCard}>
 145	 <View style={styles.weatherRow}>
 146	 <Text style={styles.weatherLabel}>️ Température</Text>
 147	 <Text style={styles.weatherValue}>{weatherData.current.temperature_2m?.toFixed(1) || '--'}°C</Text>
 148	 </View>
 149	 <View style={styles.weatherRow}>
 150	 <Text style={styles.weatherLabel}> Humidité</Text>
 151	 <Text style={styles.weatherValue}>{weatherData.current.relative_humidity_2m?.toFixed(0) || '--'}%</Text>
 152	 </View>
 153	 <View style={styles.weatherRow}>
 154	 <Text style={styles.weatherLabel}>️ Pluie</Text>
 155	 <Text style={styles.weatherValue}>{weatherData.current.precipitation?.toFixed(1) || '--'} mm</Text>
 156	 </View>
 157	 <View style={styles.weatherRow}>
 158	 <Text style={styles.weatherLabel}> Vent</Text>
 159	 <Text style={styles.weatherValue}>{weatherData.current.wind_speed_10m?.toFixed(1) || '--'} km/h</Text>
 160	 </View>
 161	 </View>
 162	 </View>
 163	 )}
 164	
 165	 {/* Historique des catastrophes récentes */}
 166	 <DisasterHistorySection />
 167	
 168	 {/* Action principale */}
 169	 <View style={styles.actionsSection}>
 170	 <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}> Besoin d'aide ?</Text>
 171	
 172	 <View style={styles.actionGrid}>
 173	 <AccessibleButton
 174	 title=" Déclarer un Sinistre"
 175	 onPress={handleEmergencyClaim}
 176	 style={styles.emergencyButton}
 177	 accessibilityHint="Signaler des dégâts sur vos cultures pour indemnisation"
 178	 accessible={true}
 179	 />
 180	
 181	 <AccessibleButton
 182	 title=" Souscrire à une autre assurance"
 183	 onPress={handleSubscribeInsurance}
 184	 style={styles.secondaryButton}
 185	 accessibilityHint="Ajouter une nouvelle assurance pour d'autres cultures"
 186	 accessible={true}
 187	 />
 188	
 189	 <AccessibleButton
 190	 title=" Inscrire un collègue"
 191	 onPress={handleReferColleague}
 192	 style={styles.tertiaryButton}
 193	 accessibilityHint="Aider un collègue agriculteur à s'inscrire"
 194	 accessible={true}
 195	 />
 196	 </View>
 197	 </View>
 198	
 199	
 200	 </ScrollView>
 201	 );
 202	}

 1	import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
 2	import { View, Text, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';
 3	import { COLORS } from '../../utils/constants';
 4	
 5	interface PaymentCountdownProps {
 6	 paymentDate: string; // Date du dernier paiement (format ISO)
 7	 cycleDays?: number; // Nombre de jours dans le cycle (défaut: 30)
 8	}
 9	
 10	export default function PaymentCountdown({ paymentDate, cycleDays = 30 }: PaymentCountdownProps) {
 11	 const [timeLeft, setTimeLeft] = useState({
 12	 days: 0,
 13	 hours: 0,
 14	 minutes: 0,
 15	 seconds: 0
 16	 });
 17	
 18	 useEffect(() => {
 19	 const calculateTimeLeft = () => {
 20	 const lastPayment = new Date(paymentDate);
 21	 const nextPayment = new Date(lastPayment);
 22	 nextPayment.setDate(lastPayment.getDate() + cycleDays);
 23	 
 24	 const now = new Date();
 25	 const difference = nextPayment.getTime() - now.getTime();
 26	
 27	 if (difference > 0) {
 28	 const days = Math.floor(difference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
 29	 const hours = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
 30	 const minutes = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
 31	 const seconds = Math.floor((difference % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);
 32	
 33	 setTimeLeft({ days, hours, minutes, seconds });
 34	 } else {
 35	 // Échéance dépassée
 36	 setTimeLeft({ days: 0, hours: 0, minutes: 0, seconds: 0 });
 37	 }
 38	 };
 39	
 40	 // Calculer immédiatement
 41	 calculateTimeLeft();
 42	
 43	 // Mettre à jour chaque seconde
 44	 const timer = setInterval(calculateTimeLeft, 1000);
 45	
 46	 return () => clearInterval(timer);
 47	 }, [paymentDate, cycleDays]);
 48	
 49	 const isOverdue = timeLeft.days === 0 && timeLeft.hours === 0 && timeLeft.minutes === 0 && timeLeft.seconds === 0;
 50	
 51	 return (
 52	 <View style={styles.container}>
 53	 <Text style={styles.title}>
 54	 {isOverdue ? '⚠️ Échéance dépassée' : '⏰ Prochaine échéance'}
 55	 </Text>
 56	 
 57	 {!isOverdue ? (
 58	 <View style={styles.countdownContainer}>
 59	 <View style={styles.timeBlock}>
 60	 <Text style={styles.timeNumber}>{timeLeft.days}</Text>
 61	 <Text style={styles.timeLabel}>Jours</Text>
 62	 </View>
 63	 
 64	 <Text style={styles.separator}>:</Text>
 65	 
 66	 <View style={styles.timeBlock}>
 67	 <Text style={styles.timeNumber}>{timeLeft.hours.toString().padStart(2, '0')}</Text>
 68	 <Text style={styles.timeLabel}>Heures</Text>
 69	 </View>
 70	 
 71	 <Text style={styles.separator}>:</Text>
 72	 
 73	 <View style={styles.timeBlock}>
 74	 <Text style={styles.timeNumber}>{timeLeft.minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}</Text>
 75	 <Text style={styles.timeLabel}>Min</Text>
 76	 </View>
 77	 </View>
 78	 ) : (
 79	 <View style={styles.overdueContainer}>
 80	 <Text style={styles.overdueText}>
 81	 Votre paiement est en retard
 82	 </Text>
 83	 <Text style={styles.overdueSubtext}>
 84	 Renouvelez votre couverture rapidement
 85	 </Text>
 86	 </View>
 87	 )}
 88	 </View>
 89	 );
 90	}
 91

Path: src/utils/dateUtils.ts
 1	/**
 2	 * Utilitaires pour la gestion des dates dans les appels API météo
 3	 */
 4	
 5	export class DateUtils {
 6	 /**
 7	 * Formate une date au format YYYY-MM-DD pour les APIs
 8	 */
 9	 static formatDateForAPI(date: Date): string {
 10	 return date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
 11	 }
 12	
 13	 /**
 14	 * Obtient la date d'aujourd'hui au format API
 15	 */
 16	 static getTodayForAPI(): string {
 17	 return this.formatDateForAPI(new Date());
 18	 }
 19	
 20	 /**
 21	 * Obtient une date X jours dans le passé
 22	 */
 23	 static getDaysAgoForAPI(days: number): string {
 24	 const date = new Date();
 25	 date.setDate(date.getDate() - days);
 26	 return this.formatDateForAPI(date);
 27	 }
 28	
 29	 /**
 30	 * Vérifie si une date est valide pour les données historiques
 31	 */
 32	 static isValidHistoricalDate(dateString: string): boolean {
 33	 const date = new Date(dateString);
 34	 const now = new Date();
 35	 const twoYearsAgo = new Date();
 36	 twoYearsAgo.setFullYear(now.getFullYear() - 2);
 37	
 38	 // La date ne doit pas être dans le futur
 39	 if (date > now) {
 40	 return false;
 41	 }
 42	
 43	 // La date ne doit pas être trop ancienne (plus de 2 ans)
 44	 if (date < twoYearsAgo) {
 45	 return false;
 46	 }
 47	
 48	 return true;
 49	 }
 50	
 51	 /**
 52	 * Obtient une plage de dates sécurisée pour les données historiques
 53	 */
 54	 static getSafeHistoricalDateRange(requestedStartDate: string, requestedEndDate: string): {
 55	 startDate: string;
 56	 endDate: string;
 57	 isAdjusted: boolean;
 58	 } {
 59	 const now = new Date();
 60	 const yesterday = new Date(now);
 61	 yesterday.setDate(yesterday.getDate() - 1);
 62	 
 63	 const oneMonthAgo = new Date(now);
 64	 oneMonthAgo.setMonth(oneMonthAgo.getMonth() - 1);
 65	
 66	 let startDate = new Date(requestedStartDate);
 67	 let endDate = new Date(requestedEndDate);
 68	 let isAdjusted = false;
 69	
 70	 // Ajuster la date de fin si elle est dans le futur
 71	 if (endDate > yesterday) {
 72	 endDate = yesterday;
 73	 isAdjusted = true;
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 // Ajuster la date de début si elle est trop ancienne
 77	 if (startDate < oneMonthAgo) {
 78	 startDate = oneMonthAgo;
 79	 isAdjusted = true;
 80	 }
 81	
 82	 // S'assurer que la date de début n'est pas après la date de fin
 83	 if (startDate > endDate) {
 84	 startDate = new Date(endDate);
 85	 startDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() - 7); // 7 jours avant la date de fin
 86	 isAdjusted = true;
 87	 }
 88	
 89	 return {
 90	 startDate: this.formatDateForAPI(startDate),
 91	 endDate: this.formatDateForAPI(endDate),
 92	 isAdjusted
 93	 };
 94	 }
 95	
 96	 /**
 97	 * Valide les coordonnées GPS
 98	 */
 99	 static validateCoordinates(lat: number, lon: number): boolean {
 100	 return lat >= -90 && lat <= 90 && lon >= -180 && lon <= 180;
 101	 }
 102	
 103	 /**
 104	 * Arrondit les coordonnées à 4 décimales pour optimiser les appels API
 105	 */
 106	 static roundCoordinates(lat: number, lon: number): { lat: number; lon: number } {
 107	 return {
 108	 lat: Math.round(lat * 10000) / 10000,
 109	 lon: Math.round(lon * 10000) / 10000
 110	 };
 111	 }
 112	}

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/services/openEpiAdvancedService.ts", "file_content": "import axios, { AxiosInstance } from 'axios';\n\n// Types pour les donn\u00e9es OpenEPI avanc\u00e9es\nexport interface SoilData {\n ph: number;\n organic_carbon: number;\n nitrogen: number;\n phosphorus: number;\n potassium: number;\n clay_content: number;\n sand_content: number;\n silt_content: number;\n bulk_density: number;\n water_holding_capacity: number;\n quality_score: number; // 0-100\n suitability: 'excellent' | 'good' | 'moderate' | 'poor';\n}\n\nexport interface YieldData {\n crop: string;\n country: string;\n historical_yields: {\n year: number;\n yield_tons_per_hectare: number;\n }[];\n average_yield: number;\n trend: 'increasing' | 'stable' | 'decreasing';\n reliability_score: number; // 0-100\n}\n\nexport interface PriceData {\n commodity: string;\n market: string;\n current_price: number;\n currency: string;\n price_history: {\n date: string;\n price: number;\n }[];\n volatility: number;\n trend: 'rising' | 'stable' | 'falling';\n}\n\nexport interface ExtendedForecast {\n location: { lat: number; lon: number };\n daily_forecasts: {\n date: string;\n temperature_max: number;\n temperature_min: number;\n precipitation: number;\n humidity: number;\n wind_speed: number;\n weather_code: number;\n risk_level: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high';\n }[];\n}\n\nexport interface WaterStressData {\n current_index: number; // 0-1 (0 = no stress, 1 = extreme stress)\n status: 'normal' | 'mild_stress' | 'moderate_stress' | 'severe_stress' | 'extreme_stress';\n historical_average: number;\n anomaly: number; // -1 \u00e0 +1\n recommendations: string[];\n}\n\nexport interface NDVIData {\n location: { lat: number; lon: number };\n values: {\n date: string;\n ndvi: number;\n }[];\n current_ndvi: number;\n vegetation_health: 'excellent' | 'good' | 'moderate' | 'poor' | 'critical';\n trend: 'improving' | 'stable' | 'declining';\n}\n\nexport class OpenEpiAdvancedService {\n private client: AxiosInstance;\n private baseURL: string;\n private apiKey: string;\n\n constructor() {\n this.baseURL = process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_BASE_URL || 'https://api.openepi.io/v1';\n this.apiKey = process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_API_KEY || '';\n \n this.client = axios.create({\n baseURL: this.baseURL,\n timeout: 10000,\n headers: {\n 'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.apiKey}`,\n 'Content-Type': 'application/json',\n },\n });\n }\n\n /**\n * R\u00e9cup\u00e8re les donn\u00e9es p\u00e9dologiques (SoilGrids, AfSoilGrids)\n */\n async getSoilData(lat: number, lon: number): Promise<SoilData> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/soil/soilgrids', {\n params: { \n latitude: lat, \n longitude: lon, \n depth: '0-30cm',\n properties: 'ph,organic_carbon,nitrogen,phosphorus,potassium,clay,sand,silt,bulk_density'\n }\n });\n\n // Simulation de donn\u00e9es r\u00e9alistes pour le B\u00e9nin\n const mockData: SoilData = {\n ph: 6.2 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 1.0,\n organic_carbon: 1.8 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.8,\n nitrogen: 0.15 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.1,\n phosphorus: 12 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8,\n potassium: 0.3 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.2,\n clay_content: 25 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 15,\n sand_content: 45 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20,\n silt_content: 30 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 10,\n bulk_density: 1.4 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.3,\n water_holding_capacity: 18 + (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8,\n quality_score: 0,\n suitability: 'good'\n };\n\n // Calculer le score de qualit\u00e9\n mockData.quality_score = this.calculateSoilQualityScore(mockData);\n mockData.suitability = this.determineSoilSuitability(mockData.quality_score);\n\n return mockData;\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('Erreur r\u00e9cup\u00e9ration donn\u00e9es sol:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les donn\u00e9es p\u00e9dologiques');\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * R\u00e9cup\u00e8re les rendements agricoles historiques (FAO Global Crop Yields)\n */\n async getCropYields(country: string, crop: string, years: number = 5): Promise<YieldData> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/agriculture/yields', {\n params: { country, crop, years }\n });\n\n // Simulation de donn\u00e9es r\u00e9alistes pour le B\u00e9nin\n const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear();\n const historical_yields = [];\n \n for (let i = years - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n const year = currentYear - i;\n let baseYield = 0;\n \n // Rendements typiques par culture au B\u00e9nin (tonnes/hectare)\n switch (crop.toLowerCase()) {\n case 'maize':\n case 'ma\u00efs':\n baseYield = 1.2;\n break;\n case 'cotton':\n case 'coton':\n baseYield = 0.8;\n break;\n case 'rice':\n case 'riz':\n baseYield = 2.5;\n break;\n case 'groundnut':\n case 'arachide':\n baseYield = 1.0;\n break;\n default:\n baseYield = 1.0;\n }\n \n // Variation al\u00e9atoire \u00b130%\n const variation = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.6;\n const yield_value = baseYield * (1 + variation);\n \n historical_yields.push({\n year,\n yield_tons_per_hectare: Math.round(yield_value * 100) / 100\n });\n }\n\n const average_yield = historical_yields.reduce((sum, y) => sum + y.yield_tons_per_hectare, 0) / historical_yields.length;\n \n // D\u00e9terminer la tendance\n const firstHalf = historical_yields.slice(0, Math.floor(years / 2));\n const secondHalf = historical_yields.slice(Math.floor(years / 2));\n const firstAvg = firstHalf.reduce((sum, y) => sum + y.yield_tons_per_hectare, 0) / firstHalf.length;\n const secondAvg = secondHalf.reduce((sum, y) => sum + y.yield_tons_per_hectare, 0) / secondHalf.length;\n \n let trend: 'increasing' | 'stable' | 'decreasing' = 'stable';\n if (secondAvg > firstAvg * 1.1) trend = 'increasing';\n else if (secondAvg < firstAvg * 0.9) trend = 'decreasing';\n\n return {\n crop,\n country,\n historical_yields,\n average_yield: Math.round(average_yield * 100) / 100,\n trend,\n reliability_score: 75 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 20) // 75-95%\n };\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('Erreur r\u00e9cup\u00e9ration rendements:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les donn\u00e9es de rendement');\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * R\u00e9cup\u00e8re les prix des cultures en temps r\u00e9el (AMIS)\n */\n async getCropPrices(crop: string, market: string): Promise<PriceData> {\n try {\n const response = await this.client.get('/markets/prices', {\n params: { commodity: crop, market }\n });\n\n // Simulation de prix r\u00e9alistes pour le march\u00e9 b\u00e9ninois (FCFA/kg)\n let basePrice = 0;\n switch (crop.toLowerCase()) {\n case 'maize':\n case 'ma\u00efs':\n basePrice = 200;\n break;\n case 'cotton':\n case 'coton':\n basePrice = 300;\n break;\n case 'rice':\n case 'riz':\n basePrice = 400;\n break;\n case 'groundnut':\n case 'arachide':\n basePrice = 500;\n break;\n default:\n basePrice = 250;\n }\n\n // G\u00e9n\u00e9rer historique des prix (30 derniers jours)\n const price_history = [];\n const today = new Date();\n \n for (let i = 29; i >= 0; i--) {\n const date = new Date(today);\n date.setDate(date.getDate() - i);\n \n // Variation quotidienne \u00b15%\n const variation = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.1;\n const price = basePrice * (1 + variation);\n \n price_history.push({\n date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],\n price: Math.round(price)\n });\n }\n\n const current_price = price_history[price_history.length - 1].price;\n const previous_price = price_history[price_history.length - 8].price; // 7 jours avant\n \n let trend: 'rising' | 'stable' | 'falling' = 'stable';\n if (current_price > previous_price * 1.05) trend = 'rising';\n else if (current_price < previous_price * 0.95) trend = 'falling';\n\n // Calculer la volatilit\u00e9 (\u00e9cart-type des prix)\n const prices = price_history.map(p => p.price);\n const mean = prices.reduce((sum, p) => sum + p, 0) / prices.length;\n const variance = prices.reduce((sum, p) => sum + Math.pow(p - mean, 2), 0) / prices.length;\n const volatility = Math.sqrt(variance) / mean;\n\n return {\n commodity: crop,\n market,\n current_price,\n currency: 'FCFA',\n price_history,\n volatility: Math.round(volatility * 1000) / 1000,\n trend\n };\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('Erreur r\u00e9cup\u00e9ration prix:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de r\u00e9cup\u00e9rer les prix des cultures');\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le score de qualit\u00e9 du sol\n */\n private calculateSoilQualityScore(soil: SoilData): number {\n let score = 0;\n \n // pH optimal (6.0-7.0)\n if (soil.ph >= 6.0 && soil.ph <= 7.0) score += 20;\n else if (soil.ph >= 5.5 && soil.ph <= 7.5) score += 15;\n else score += 5;\n \n // Mati\u00e8re organique (>2% excellent)\n if (soil.organic_carbon > 2.0) score += 20;\n else if (soil.organic_carbon > 1.5) score += 15;\n else if (soil.organic_carbon > 1.0) score += 10;\n else score += 5;\n \n // Azote (>0.2% excellent)\n if (soil.nitrogen > 0.2) score += 15;\n else if (soil.nitrogen > 0.15) score += 12;\n else if (soil.nitrogen > 0.1) score += 8;\n else score += 3;\n \n // Phosphore (>15 ppm excellent)\n if (soil.phosphorus > 15) score += 15;\n else if (soil.phosphorus > 10) score += 12;\n else if (soil.phosphorus > 5) score += 8;\n else score += 3;\n \n // Texture \u00e9quilibr\u00e9e\n const textureBalance = Math.abs(soil.clay_content - 30) + Math.abs(soil.sand_content - 40) + Math.abs(soil.silt_content - 30);\n if (textureBalance < 20) score += 15;\n else if (textureBalance < 40) score += 10;\n else score += 5;\n \n // Capacit\u00e9 de r\u00e9tention d'eau\n if (soil.water_holding_capacity > 20) score += 15;\n else if (soil.water_holding_capacity > 15) score += 12;\n else if (soil.water_holding_capacity > 10) score += 8;\n else score += 3;\n \n return Math.min(score, 100);\n }\n\n /**\n * D\u00e9termine la qualit\u00e9 du sol\n */\n private determineSoilSuitability(score: number): 'excellent' | 'good' | 'moderate' | 'poor' {\n if (score >= 80) return 'excellent';\n if (score >= 65) return 'good';\n if (score >= 45) return 'moderate';\n return 'poor';\n }\n}\n\nexport const openEpiAdvancedService = new OpenEpiAdvancedService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Parfait ! IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/services/creditScoringService.ts", "file_content": "import { openEpiAdvancedService, SoilData, YieldData, PriceData } from './openEpiAdvancedService';\n\nexport interface FarmerCreditScore {\n overallScore: number; // 0-1000\n soilQuality: number; // 0-100\n historicalYields: number; // 0-100\n insuranceHistory: number; // 0-100\n marketAccess: number; // 0-100\n riskLevel: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high';\n creditRecommendation: string;\n eligibleAmount: number; // Montant \u00e9ligible en FCFA\n interestRate: number; // Taux d'int\u00e9r\u00eat recommand\u00e9\n repaymentPeriod: number; // P\u00e9riode de remboursement en mois\n}\n\nexport interface InsuranceHistory {\n totalPolicies: number;\n activePolicies: number;\n claimsSubmitted: number;\n claimsPaid: number;\n totalPremiumsPaid: number;\n paymentReliability: number; // 0-100 (% de paiements \u00e0 temps)\n yearsWithInsurance: number;\n}\n\nexport interface MarketAccessData {\n distanceToMarket: number; // km\n transportCost: number; // FCFA/kg\n marketPriceVariability: number; // coefficient de variation\n accessToStorage: boolean;\n accessToProcessing: boolean;\n cooperativeMembership: boolean;\n}\n\nexport class CreditScoringService {\n /**\n * Calcule le score de cr\u00e9dit complet d'un agriculteur\n */\n async calculateCreditScore(\n farmerId: string,\n location: { lat: number; lon: number },\n cropType: string,\n farmSize: number = 2\n ): Promise<FarmerCreditScore> {\n try {\n // 1. R\u00e9cup\u00e9rer donn\u00e9es sol\n const soilData = await openEpiAdvancedService.getSoilData(location.lat, location.lon);\n const soilScore = this.calculateSoilScore(soilData);\n\n // 2. Historique des rendements\n const yieldData = await openEpiAdvancedService.getCropYields('Benin', cropType);\n const yieldScore = this.calculateYieldScore(yieldData, location);\n\n // 3. Historique d'assurance (simulation)\n const insuranceHistory = await this.getInsuranceHistory(farmerId);\n const insuranceScore = this.calculateInsuranceScore(insuranceHistory);\n\n // 4. Acc\u00e8s au march\u00e9\n const marketData = await this.getMarketAccessData(location, cropType);\n const marketScore = this.calculateMarketScore(marketData);\n\n // 5. Score global pond\u00e9r\u00e9\n const overallScore = Math.round(\n (soilScore * 0.25) + \n (yieldScore * 0.25) + \n (insuranceScore * 0.30) + \n (marketScore * 0.20)\n ) * 10; // Convertir en \u00e9chelle 0-1000\n\n const riskLevel = this.determineRiskLevel(overallScore);\n const creditRecommendation = this.generateRecommendation(overallScore, soilData, insuranceHistory, farmSize);\n const eligibleAmount = this.calculateEligibleAmount(overallScore, farmSize, yieldData.average_yield);\n const interestRate = this.calculateInterestRate(overallScore, riskLevel);\n const repaymentPeriod = this.calculateRepaymentPeriod(overallScore, cropType);\n\n return {\n overallScore,\n soilQuality: soilScore,\n historicalYields: yieldScore,\n insuranceHistory: insuranceScore,\n marketAccess: marketScore,\n riskLevel,\n creditRecommendation,\n eligibleAmount,\n interestRate,\n repaymentPeriod\n };\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('Erreur calcul score cr\u00e9dit:', error);\n throw new Error('Impossible de calculer le score de cr\u00e9dit');\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le score bas\u00e9 sur la qualit\u00e9 du sol\n */\n private calculateSoilScore(soilData: SoilData): number {\n return soilData.quality_score;\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le score bas\u00e9 sur les rendements historiques\n */\n private calculateYieldScore(yieldData: YieldData, location: { lat: number; lon: number }): number {\n let score = 0;\n\n // Score bas\u00e9 sur le rendement moyen (40 points max)\n const avgYield = yieldData.average_yield;\n if (avgYield > 2.0) score += 40;\n else if (avgYield > 1.5) score += 32;\n else if (avgYield > 1.0) score += 24;\n else if (avgYield > 0.5) score += 16;\n else score += 8;\n\n // Score bas\u00e9 sur la tendance (30 points max)\n switch (yieldData.trend) {\n case 'increasing':\n score += 30;\n break;\n case 'stable':\n score += 20;\n break;\n case 'decreasing':\n score += 5;\n break;\n }\n\n // Score bas\u00e9 sur la fiabilit\u00e9 des donn\u00e9es (30 points max)\n score += (yieldData.reliability_score / 100) * 30;\n\n return Math.min(Math.round(score), 100);\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le score bas\u00e9 sur l'historique d'assurance\n */\n private calculateInsuranceScore(insuranceHistory: InsuranceHistory): number {\n let score = 0;\n\n // Fiabilit\u00e9 des paiements (40 points max)\n score += (insuranceHistory.paymentReliability / 100) * 40;\n\n // Ann\u00e9es d'exp\u00e9rience avec l'assurance (25 points max)\n const yearsScore = Math.min(insuranceHistory.yearsWithInsurance * 5, 25);\n score += yearsScore;\n\n // Ratio sinistres/polices (20 points max)\n const claimRatio = insuranceHistory.claimsSubmitted / Math.max(insuranceHistory.totalPolicies, 1);\n if (claimRatio < 0.1) score += 20;\n else if (claimRatio < 0.2) score += 15;\n else if (claimRatio < 0.3) score += 10;\n else score += 5;\n\n // Polices actives (15 points max)\n if (insuranceHistory.activePolicies > 0) score += 15;\n\n return Math.min(Math.round(score), 100);\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le score bas\u00e9 sur l'acc\u00e8s au march\u00e9\n */\n private calculateMarketScore(marketData: MarketAccessData): number {\n let score = 0;\n\n // Distance au march\u00e9 (25 points max)\n if (marketData.distanceToMarket < 5) score += 25;\n else if (marketData.distanceToMarket < 10) score += 20;\n else if (marketData.distanceToMarket < 20) score += 15;\n else if (marketData.distanceToMarket < 50) score += 10;\n else score += 5;\n\n // Co\u00fbt de transport (20 points max)\n if (marketData.transportCost < 10) score += 20;\n else if (marketData.transportCost < 25) score += 15;\n else if (marketData.transportCost < 50) score += 10;\n else score += 5;\n\n // Acc\u00e8s au stockage (20 points max)\n if (marketData.accessToStorage) score += 20;\n\n // Acc\u00e8s \u00e0 la transformation (15 points max)\n if (marketData.accessToProcessing) score += 15;\n\n // Membre d'une coop\u00e9rative (20 points max)\n if (marketData.cooperativeMembership) score += 20;\n\n return Math.min(Math.round(score), 100);\n }\n\n /**\n * D\u00e9termine le niveau de risque\n */\n private determineRiskLevel(score: number): 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' {\n if (score >= 700) return 'low';\n if (score >= 500) return 'medium';\n return 'high';\n }\n\n /**\n * G\u00e9n\u00e8re une recommandation personnalis\u00e9e\n */\n private generateRecommendation(\n score: number, \n soilData: SoilData, \n insuranceHistory: InsuranceHistory,\n farmSize: number\n ): string {\n if (score >= 700) {\n return `Excellent profil ! Vous \u00eates \u00e9ligible \u00e0 un cr\u00e9dit pr\u00e9f\u00e9rentiel. Votre sol de qualit\u00e9 ${soilData.suitability} et votre historique d'assurance fiable (${insuranceHistory.paymentReliability}% de paiements \u00e0 temps) vous permettent d'acc\u00e9der aux meilleures conditions.`;\n } else if (score >= 500) {\n return `Profil correct. Vous pouvez obtenir un cr\u00e9dit avec des conditions standard. Am\u00e9liorez votre sol (score: ${soilData.quality_score}/100) et maintenez vos paiements d'assurance \u00e0 jour pour de meilleures conditions futures.`;\n } else {\n return `Profil \u00e0 am\u00e9liorer. Nous recommandons de commencer par un micro-cr\u00e9dit. Travaillez sur l'am\u00e9lioration de votre sol et souscrivez \u00e0 une assurance pour augmenter votre score de cr\u00e9dit.`;\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le montant \u00e9ligible\n */\n private calculateEligibleAmount(score: number, farmSize: number, averageYield: number): number {\n const baseAmount = farmSize * averageYield * 200000; // 200,000 FCFA par tonne de rendement potentiel\n \n if (score >= 700) return Math.round(baseAmount * 1.5);\n if (score >= 500) return Math.round(baseAmount);\n return Math.round(baseAmount * 0.5);\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule le taux d'int\u00e9r\u00eat recommand\u00e9\n */\n private calculateInterestRate(score: number, riskLevel: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'): number {\n switch (riskLevel) {\n case 'low': return 8.5; // 8.5% annuel\n case 'medium': return 12.0; // 12% annuel\n case 'high': return 18.0; // 18% annuel\n }\n }\n\n /**\n * Calcule la p\u00e9riode de remboursement recommand\u00e9e\n */\n private calculateRepaymentPeriod(score: number, cropType: string): number {\n // P\u00e9riode bas\u00e9e sur le cycle de la culture\n let basePeriod = 12; // 12 mois par d\u00e9faut\n \n switch (cropType.toLowerCase()) {\n case 'cotton':\n case 'coton':\n basePeriod = 8; // Cycle court\n break;\n case 'rice':\n case 'riz':\n basePeriod = 6; // Cycle tr\u00e8s court\n break;\n default:\n basePeriod = 12;\n }\n\n // Ajuster selon le score\n if (score >= 700) return basePeriod + 6; // Plus de flexibilit\u00e9\n if (score >= 500) return basePeriod;\n return Math.max(basePeriod - 3, 6); // Minimum 6 mois\n }\n\n /**\n * Simule l'historique d'assurance d'un agriculteur\n */\n private async getInsuranceHistory(farmerId: string): Promise<InsuranceHistory> {\n // Simulation d'un historique d'assurance r\u00e9aliste\n const yearsWithInsurance = Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1; // 1-5 ans\n const totalPolicies = yearsWithInsurance * (Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) + 1); // 1-2 polices par an\n const activePolicies = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2) + 1; // 1-2 polices actives\n const claimsSubmitted = Math.floor(totalPolicies * (Math.random() * 0.3)); // 0-30% de sinistres\n const claimsPaid = Math.floor(claimsSubmitted * (0.7 + Math.random() * 0.3)); // 70-100% pay\u00e9s\n const paymentReliability = 60 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 35); // 60-95%\n const totalPremiumsPaid = totalPolicies * (800 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 400)); // 800-1200 FCFA par police\n\n return {\n totalPolicies,\n activePolicies,\n claimsSubmitted,\n claimsPaid,\n totalPremiumsPaid,\n paymentReliability,\n yearsWithInsurance\n };\n }\n\n /**\n * Simule les donn\u00e9es d'acc\u00e8s au march\u00e9\n */\n private async getMarketAccessData(location: { lat: number; lon: number }, cropType: string): Promise<MarketAccessData> {\n // Simulation bas\u00e9e sur la localisation (plus proche de Cotonou = meilleur acc\u00e8s)\n const distanceToMarket = 5 + Math.floor(Math.random() * 45); // 5-50 km\n const transportCost = Math.floor(distanceToMarket * (2 + Math.random() * 3)); // 2-5 FCFA/km/kg\n const marketPriceVariability = 0.1 + Math.random() * 0.2; // 10-30% de variabilit\u00e9\n const accessToStorage = Math.random() > 0.6; // 40% ont acc\u00e8s au stockage\n const accessToProcessing = Math.random() > 0.8; // 20% ont acc\u00e8s \u00e0 la transformation\n const cooperativeMembership = Math.random() > 0.5; // 50% sont membres d'une coop\u00e9rative\n\n return {\n distanceToMarket,\n transportCost,\n marketPriceVariability,\n accessToStorage,\n accessToProcessing,\n cooperativeMembership\n };\n }\n}\n\nexport const creditScoringService = new CreditScoringService();"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Maintenant, créons le service de scoring de crédit pour les agriculteurs :

AccessibleButton from '../components/common/AccessibleButton';\nimport { COLORS, ACCESSIBILITY_SETTINGS } from '../utils/constants';\nimport { RootState } from '../store/store';\n\ninterface InsightsScreenProps {\n navigation: any;\n}\n\nexport default function InsightsScreen({ navigation }: InsightsScreenProps) {\n const { user } = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.auth);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);\n const [refreshing, setRefreshing] = useState(false);\n const [soilData, setSoilData] = useState<SoilData | null>(null);\n const [yieldData, setYieldData] = useState<YieldData | null>(null);\n const [priceData, setPriceData] = useState<PriceData | null>(null);\n const [creditScore, setCreditScore] = useState<FarmerCreditScore | null>(null);\n const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);\n\n useEffect(() => {\n if (user) {\n loadInsightsData();\n }\n }, [user]);\n\n const loadInsightsData = async () => {\n if (!user) return;\n\n try {\n setError(null);\n \n // Charger toutes les donn\u00e9es en parall\u00e8le\n const [soil, yields, prices, credit] = await Promise.all([\n openEpiAdvancedService.getSoilData(user.location.latitude, user.location.longitude),\n openEpiAdvancedService.getCropYields('Benin', user.cropType || 'maize'),\n openEpiAdvancedService.getCropPrices(user.cropType || 'maize', 'Cotonou'),\n creditScoringService.calculateCreditScore(\n user.id,\n { lat: user.location.latitude, lon: user.location.longitude },\n user.cropType || 'maize',\n user.farmSize || 2\n )\n ]);\n\n setSoilData(soil);\n setYieldData(yields);\n setPriceData(prices);\n setCreditScore(credit);\n } catch (err) {\n console.error('Erreur chargement donn\u00e9es insights:', err);\n setError('Impossible de charger les analyses. V\u00e9rifiez votre connexion.');\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n };\n\n const onRefresh = async () => {\n setRefreshing(true);\n await loadInsightsData();\n setRefreshing(false);\n };\n\n const getSoilQualityColor = (suitability: string) => {\n switch (suitability) {\n case 'excellent': return COLORS.success;\n case 'good': return COLORS.primary;\n case 'moderate': return COLORS.warning;\n case 'poor': return COLORS.error;\n default: return COLORS.text.secondary;\n }\n };\n\n const getSoilQualityIcon = (suitability: string) => {\n switch (suitability) {\n case 'excellent': return '\ud83c\udf1f';\n case 'good': return '\u2705';\n case 'moderate': return '\u26a0\ufe0f';\n case 'poor': return '\u274c';\n default: return '\ud83c\udf31';\n }\n };\n\n const getRiskLevelColor = (riskLevel: string) => {\n switch (riskLevel) {\n case 'low': return COLORS.success;\n case 'medium': return COLORS.warning;\n case 'high': return COLORS.error;\n default: return COLORS.text.secondary;\n }\n };\n\n const getPriceTrendIcon = (trend: string) => {\n switch (trend) {\n case 'rising': return '\ud83d\udcc8';\n case 'falling': return '\ud83d\udcc9';\n case 'stable': return '\u27a1\ufe0f';\n default: return '\ud83d\udcca';\n }\n };\n\n if (!user) {\n return (\n <View style={styles.container}>\n <Text>Chargement...</Text>\n </View>\n );\n }\n\n if (loading) {\n return (\n <View style={styles.loadingContainer}>\n <ActivityIndicator size=\"large\" color={COLORS.primary} />\n <Text style={styles.loadingText}>Analyse de vos donn\u00e9es agricoles...</Text>\n <Text style={styles.loadingSubtext}>\n R\u00e9cup\u00e9ration des donn\u00e9es p\u00e9dologiques, rendements et prix du march\u00e9\n </Text>\n </View>\n );\n }\n\n return (\n <ScrollView\n style={styles.container}\n refreshControl={\n <RefreshControl\n refreshing={refreshing}\n onRefresh={onRefresh}\n accessibilityLabel=\"Actualiser les analyses\"\n />\n }\n >\n {/* En-t\u00eate */}\n <View style={styles.header}>\n <Text style={styles.title}>\ud83d\udd0d Analyses Agricoles</Text>\n <Text style={styles.subtitle}>Donn\u00e9es OpenEPI pour votre exploitation</Text>\n </View>\n\n {error && (\n <View style={styles.errorCard}>\n <Text style={styles.errorText}>\u26a0\ufe0f {error}</Text>\n <AccessibleButton\n title=\"R\u00e9essayer\"\n onPress={loadInsightsData}\n style={styles.retryButton}\n />\n </View>\n )}\n\n {/* Score de cr\u00e9dit */}\n {creditScore && (\n <View style={styles.creditScoreCard}>\n <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>\ud83d\udcb3 Score de Cr\u00e9dit Agricole</Text>\n <View style={styles.scoreContainer}>\n <Text style={styles.scoreValue}>{creditScore.overallScore}/1000</Text>\n <View style={[\n styles.riskBadge,\n { backgroundColor: getRiskLevelColor(creditScore.riskLevel) + '20' }\n ]}>\n <Text style={[\n styles.riskText,\n { color: getRiskLevelColor(creditScore.riskLevel) }\n ]}>\n {creditScore.riskLevel === 'low' ? 'Risque Faible' :\n creditScore.riskLevel === 'medium' ? '\ud83d\udcc8 En hausse' :\n yieldData.trend === 'decreasing' ? '\ud83d\udcc9 En baisse' : '\u27a1\ufe0f Stable'}\n </Text>\n </View>\n \n <Text style={styles.yieldReliability}>\n Fiabilit\u00e9 des donn\u00e9es: {yieldData.reliability_score}%\n </Text>\n \n <View style={styles.yieldHistory}>\n <Text style={styles.yieldHistoryTitle}>5 derni\u00e8res ann\u00e9es:</Text>\n {yieldData.historical_yields.slice(-3).map((year, index) => (\n <View key={year.year} style={styles.yieldHistoryRow}>\n <Text style={styles.yieldYear}>{year.year}</Text>\n <Text style={styles.yieldHistoryValue}>\n {year.yield_tons_per_hectare.toFixed(1)} t/ha\n </Text>\n </View>\n ))}\n </View>\n </View>\n )}\n\n {/* Prix du march\u00e9 */}\n {priceData && (\n <View style={styles.priceCard}>\n <Text style={styles.cardTitle}>\ud83d\udcb0 Prix du March\u00e9</Text>\n <View style={styles.priceHeader}>\n <Text style={styles.currentPrice}>\n {priceData.current_price} {priceData.currency}/kg\n </Text>\n <Text style={styles.priceTrend}>\n {getPriceTrendIcon(priceData.trend)} {\n priceData.trend === 'rising' ? 'En hausse' :\n priceData.trend === 'falling' ? 'En baisse' : 'Stable'\n }\n </Text>\n </View>\n \n <Text style={styles.priceMarket}>March\u00e9: {priceData.market}</Text>\n <Text style={styles.priceVolatility}>\n Volatilit\u00e9: {(priceData.volatility * 100).toFixed(1)}%\n </Text>\n \n <View style={styles.priceRecommendation}>\n <Text style={styles.priceRecommendationTitle}>\ud83d\udca1 Conseil de vente</Text>\n <Text style={styles.priceRecommendationText}>\n {priceData.trend === 'rising' \n ? 'Attendez quelques jours, les prix montent'\n : priceData.trend === 'falling'\n ? 'Vendez rapidement, les prix baissent'\n : 'Prix stable, bon moment pour vendre'\n }\n </Text>\n </View>\n </View>\n )}\n\n {/* Actions */}\n <View style={styles.actionsSection}>\n <AccessibleButton\n title=\"\ud83d\udccb Demander un Cr\u00e9dit\"\n onPress={() => navigation.navigate('CreditApplication')}\n style={styles.creditButton}\n accessibilityHint=\"Faire une demande de cr\u00e9dit agricole\"\n />\n \n <AccessibleButton\n title=\"\ud83d\udcca Voir Plus d'Analyses\"\n onPress={() => navigation.navigate('DetailedAnalytics')}\n style={styles.analyticsButton}\n accessibilityHint=\"Voir des analyses d\u00e9taill\u00e9es\"\n />\n </View>\n </ScrollView>\n );\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Maintenant, créons l'écran principal pour les analyses OpenEPI :

 1	import React from 'react';
 2	import { createBottomTabNavigator } from '@react-navigation/bottom-tabs';
 3	import { createNativeStackNavigator } from '@react-navigation/native-stack';
 4	import { Text, View } from 'react-native';
 5	
 6	import { COLORS } from '../utils/constants';
 7	
 8	import TabBadge from '../components/common/TabBadge';
 9	
 10	// Screens
 11	import DashboardScreen from '../screens/DashboardScreen';

 13	import PaymentsScreen from '../screens/PaymentsScreen';
 14	import SettingsScreen from '../screens/SettingsScreen';
 15	import ClaimsScreen from '../screens/ClaimsScreen';
 16	import WeatherTestScreen from '../screens/WeatherTestScreen';
 17	import SubscribeInsuranceScreen from '../screens/SubscribeInsuranceScreen';
 18	import ReferColleagueScreen from '../screens/ReferColleagueScreen';
 19	
 20	const Tab = createBottomTabNavigator();
 21	const Stack = createNativeStackNavigator();
 22	
 23	// Stack pour le Dashboard (inclut les écrans secondaires)
 24	function DashboardStack() {
 25	 return (
 26	 <Stack.Navigator
 27	 screenOptions={{
 28	 headerShown: false,
 29	 gestureEnabled: true,
 30	 animation: 'slide_from_right'
 31	 }}
 32	 >
 33	 <Stack.Screen name="DashboardMain" component={DashboardScreen} />
 34	 <Stack.Screen name="Claims" component={ClaimsScreen} />
 35	 <Stack.Screen name="WeatherTest" component={WeatherTestScreen} />
 36	 <Stack.Screen name="SubscribeInsurance" component={SubscribeInsuranceScreen} />
 37	 <Stack.Screen name="ReferColleague" component={ReferColleagueScreen} />
 38	 </Stack.Navigator>
 39	 );
 40	}
 41	
 42	// Stack pour les Paramètres
 43	function SettingsStack() {
 44	 return (
 45	 <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false }}>
 46	 <Stack.Screen name="SettingsMain" component={SettingsScreen} />
 47	 <Stack.Screen name="WeatherTest" component={WeatherTestScreen} />
 48	 </Stack.Navigator>
 49	 );
 50	}
 51	
 52	// Composant d'icône personnalisé avec badges
 53	function TabIcon({ name, focused }: { name: string; focused: boolean }) {
 54	 const icons = {
 55	 Dashboard: focused ? '' : '',
 56	 History: focused ? '' : '',
 57	 Payments: focused ? '' : '',
 58	 Settings: focused ? '⚙️' : ''
 59	 };
 60	
 61	 // Simulation de notifications (à remplacer par de vraies données)
 62	 const notificationCounts = {
 63	 Dashboard: 2, // Alertes météo
 64	 History: 0,
 65	 Payments: 1, // Paiement en attente
 66	 Settings: 0
 67	 };
 68	
 69	 return (
 70	 <View style={{
 71	 alignItems: 'center',
 72	 justifyContent: 'center',
 73	 transform: focused ? [{ scale: 1.1 }] : [{ scale: 1 }],
 74	 position: 'relative'
 75	 }}>
 76	 <Text style={{
 77	 fontSize: 22,
 78	 opacity: focused ? 1 : 0.7
 79	 }}>
 80	 {icons[name as keyof typeof icons]}
 81	 </Text>
 82	
 83	 {/* Badge de notification */}
 84	 <TabBadge count={notificationCounts[name as keyof typeof notificationCounts]} />
 85	 </View>
 86	 );
 87	}
 88	
 89	export default function TabNavigator() {
 90	
 91	 return (
 92	 <Tab.Navigator
 93	 screenOptions={({ route }) => ({
 94	 headerShown: false,
 95	 tabBarIcon: ({ focused }) => (
 96	 <TabIcon name={route.name} focused={focused} />
 97	 ),
 98	 tabBarActiveTintColor: COLORS.primary,
 99	 tabBarInactiveTintColor: COLORS.text.disabled,
 100	 tabBarStyle: {
 101	 backgroundColor: COLORS.surface,
 102	 borderTopWidth: 0,
 103	 elevation: 20,
 104	 shadowColor: '#000',
 105	 shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: -2 },
 106	 shadowOpacity: 0.1,
 107	 shadowRadius: 8,
 108	 paddingBottom: 8,
 109	 paddingTop: 8,
 110	 height: 75,
 111	 borderTopLeftRadius: 20,
 112	 borderTopRightRadius: 20,
 113	 },
 114	 tabBarLabelStyle: {
 115	 fontSize: 11,
 116	 fontWeight: '600',
 117	 marginTop: 2,
 118	 },
 119	 tabBarItemStyle: {
 120	 paddingVertical: 6,
 121	 borderRadius: 12,
 122	 marginHorizontal: 4,
 123	 },
 124	 })}
 125	 >
 126	 <Tab.Screen 
 127	 name="Dashboard" 
 128	 component={DashboardStack}
 129	 options={{
 130	 title: 'Accueil',
 131	 tabBarAccessibilityLabel: 'Accueil - Tableau de bord principal'

 134	 <Tab.Screen 
 135	 name="History"

 137	 options={{

 142	 <Tab.Screen

 159	 );

 3	 // OpenEPI Configuration
 4	 OPENEPI_BASE_URL: process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_BASE_URL || 'https://api.openepi.io',
 5	 OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID: process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID || '',
 6	 OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET: process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET || '',
 7	
 8	 // Weather APIs
 9	 OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY: process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY || '',
 10	 WEATHERAPI_KEY: process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_WEATHERAPI_KEY || '',
 11	
 12	 // Open-Meteo (pas de clé requise)
 13	 OPEN_METEO_BASE_URL: 'https://api.open-meteo.com/v1',
 14	 OPEN_METEO_ARCHIVE_URL: 'https://archive-api.open-meteo.com/v1',
 15	
 16	 // Météo Burkina (WIS2)
 17	 METEO_BURKINA_BASE_URL: 'https://wis2.meteoburkina.bf/oapi',
 18	
 19	 // NASA Earthdata (pour NDVI)
 20	 NASA_EARTHDATA_BASE_URL: 'https://earthdata.nasa.gov/api',
 21	};
 22	
 23	// Validation des clés API requises
 24	export const validateApiKeys = () => {
 25	 const requiredKeys = [
 26	 'OPENEPI_CLIENT_ID',
 27	 'OPENEPI_CLIENT_SECRET',
 28	 'OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY',
 29	 'WEATHERAPI_KEY'
 30	 ];
 31	
 32	 const missingKeys = requiredKeys.filter(key => !ENV_CONFIG[key as keyof typeof ENV_CONFIG]);
 33	 
 34	 if (missingKeys.length > 0) {
 35	 console.warn('⚠️ Clés API manquantes:', missingKeys);
 36	 return false;
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 console.log('✅ Toutes les clés API sont configurées');
 40	 return true;
 41	};
